deleteConfirmation.title: Delete Category
deleteConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{categoryName}}"? This action cannot be undone.
deleteConfirmation.withEvents:
Category "{{categoryName}}" is used by {{eventCount}} event(s).

This will also delete ALL events in this category:

{{eventList}}

Click OK to delete category and all its events, or Cancel to abort.
deleteConfirmation.withEventsSimple:
Category "{{categoryName}}" is used by {{eventCount}} event(s).

This will also delete ALL events in this category.

Click OK to delete category and all its events, or Cancel to abort.

cleanupConfirmation.title: Cleanup Orphaned Events
cleanupConfirmation.message:
Found {{count}} orphaned events (events with non-existent categories).

These events will be deleted:

{{eventList}}

Click OK to delete all orphaned events, or Cancel to abort.
